summary:
A registered Chartered Professional Engineer in Australia, and in The Netherlands, with a Bachelors Degree, a Post Graduate Diploma, 2 Masters Degrees, several published research papers, 2 Patents in Manufacturing, a Master Black Belt in Lean Six Sigma, a certified trainer, and 25+ years global experience.

I use my experience to work holistically with all kinds of companies and businesses to reduce their cost of doing business and increase their profit margins. My intention is to create #HealthyOrganizations, and steer them toward stable futures. My results bring about not just physical, infrastructural, and procedural changes to existing systems of manufacturing or running a business, but also affect a necessary mind-shift at key levels of the organization to make the process successful.

Two-time award-winning engineer, with several years of coaching experience on Cost Reduction, Value Engineering, and Design for Manufacturing.  Proud to have helped 4 global manufacturing factories steer away from closing down :
1. Domestic Appliances (Asia) - reduced Time to Market by 50%
2. Materials (Europe) - increased Factory Yield by 30%
3. Materials (Latin America) - created Strategic Global Partnerships within 6 months
4. Professional Lighting (Europe) - launched New Business Portfolio within 9 months

Contributed to well over 30m Euros as cost savings, and shared this experience over a 23-week online training program, which received over 25k views.

I help organizations :
1. Reduce Cost
2. Reduce Time to Market
3. Increase Factory Output
4. Improve Employee Engagement

Currently helping charities reduce their Operational Cost, and writing a book.

It is my mission to help create #HealthyOrganizations by improving #Profitability with #Engagement. Yes, I am quite certain that I can add value to you, and your organization.

Curious ?

Let's have a chat,
Aroop Bhattacharjee
BSc PgDip MSc EMBA LSSMBB
MIEAust CPEng NER APEC IntPE(Aust)
CEng(NL)

profile_positions.description:
Developing long term strategic programs, steering organizations towards stability and profitability, using principles from Operational Excellence, and DfX (where X is a specific Business Goal). 

Giving internal and external trainings / workshops, on ‘Business Consulting in Practice’, and coaching towards successful execution.

Leading ‘Core Operations’ Practice, and supporting CGI Global Business Consulting.
profile_positions.title: Principal Business Consultant

profile_positions.description:
This is a Start-Up environment, with roots in Philips and NXP, developing innovative ideas into real companies, with funding from various organizations.

Using fundamental experience in Product Design and Production, supported the teams on avoiding early mistakes, steering them towards Mass Production.
profile_positions.title: Business Mentor

profile_positions.description:
Lead the “Restriction on Hazardous Substances” (RoHS) project, which is a mandatory
European requirement
profile_positions.title: R&D Program Manager
Global Cost Master

profile_positions.description: Working as Global Program Manager in Innovation Excellence Value Space , in Porfolio and Program management , across the 4 sectors in Philips , being Lighting , Medical systems , Consumer Lifestyle and Corporate Technologies.
profile_positions.title: Global Program Manager - Innovation Excellence

profile_positions.description: Develop roadmap for 3-5 years , lead in technology and platform development for Profesisonal Luminaires for Indoor Industry.
profile_positions.title: European Program Manager - Indoor Industry

profile_positions.description: Supporting the Imaging Group with product design for demos, prototypes on camera, handphone, back lighting and also jig+fixtures for factory ; thermal simulations with Flotherm ; member of Ceramics Commodity Team.
profile_positions.title: Senior Mechanical Engineer
Senior Mechanical Engineer

volunteer_experiences.description:
Writing articles on interesting events in/around Eindhoven region, such as :
https://eindhovennews.com/news/2018/11/accelerating-our-smart-society-high-tech-campus-eindhoven/
https://eindhovennews.com/news/2018/12/cern-acceleration-program-hightechxl-eindhoven/

https://eindhovennews.com/features/2019/05/land-of-milk-and-honey/

https://eindhovennews.com/features/2019/10/are-you-an-engineer-an-ing-ir-or-ceng-confused/

https://eindhovennews.com/features/2020/03/land-of-milk-and-honey-2/
https://eindhovennews.com/corona/2020/06/dutch-technology-week-goes-online/

In 2011 , I attended the 10-day Vipassana meditation course , this had a big impact on me. Since then , I try hard to put aside 1-2 weekends per year , to help at the centre as volunteer. My duties till now were varied , from building maintenance to working in kitchen. Each and every time , that I serve a weekend , I feel grateful and look forward to next opportunity.

The Philips Global Initiatives, is network of energetic volunteer professionals within Philips. It is a non-profit organisation, with about 5000 members, focussed on adding value to the company and communities globally with Sustainability, Cradle-2-Cradle, and "Base of Pyramid" type projects.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1lOql_wMYRF0rcch75aQ32GrnDi_eCfwh/view?usp=sharing
